SocketCommunicator(Socket) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons.SocketCommunicator
Constructor for the socket communicator, creates a canal that goes both ways (client->server, server->client) sets the timeout of the socket to 30 seconds (the server has to answer in 30s max)
